newsitem.title: FINLAND: RESEARCH ALERT - Smith Barney sees Nokia up to $99.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Smith Barney sees Nokia up to $99.

text.p: U.S. investment house Smith Barney said on Wednesday its 12-month target price for Finnish telecoms group Nokia Oy's ADR was $99.
"Our 12-month target price for Nokia is $99," Anthony Langham, telecommunications analayst at Smith Barney, told Reuters by telephone.
In New York at 1455 GMT on Wednesday, Nokia's ADR traded $2-1/4 higher at $61-7/8.
Langham also forecast Nokia's 1997 EPS at $3.80 against a forecast of $2.17 for 1996.
"Nokia is an extremely good company that has not achieved fair valuation given the prospects we see for them," Langham said.
He said Nokia's P/E was "too low compared to its prospects and other companies", but declined to elaborate.
